br.furb.inf.tcc.tankcoders.scene.tank
Class AbstractTank

java.lang.Object
  com.jme.scene.SceneElement
      com.jme.scene.Spatial
          com.jme.scene.Node
              br.furb.inf.tcc.tankcoders.scene.tank.AbstractTank
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITank, com.jme.util.export.Savable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
JadgPantherTank, M1AbramsTank
public abstract class AbstractTank
extends com.jme.scene.Node
implements ITank

This class is an abstract implementation of the interface ITank. Implements all the basic operations of the Tanks.

Author:
Germano Fronza
See Also:
Serialized Form
